explanation: The issue was in the line 'item[(now[0],now[1])] == 0', which incorrectly used the equality operator (==) instead of the assignment operator (=) when trying to mark the item as consumed. By changing this to 'item[(now[0],now[1])] = 0', the program can properly indicate that the item has been consumed. This is inspired by the known fixes where an incorrect usage of the equality operator was found.
